title: Graph of Function - Intervals of Decrease

content.question: On which of the following intervals is the objectâ€™s velocity decreasing over the entire interval?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 less than t less than 4"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn></math>
<math alttext="5 less than t less than 8"><mn>5</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>8</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
